title: DNSLookupService @MainActor isolation violation causes hang — remove @MainActor, isolate only @Observable properties
description: DNSLookupService is marked @MainActor but uses DispatchSource + C callbacks (DNSServiceQueryRecord) that fire on background GCD queues. The callback tries to hop back to MainActor causing dispatch_assert_queue_fail. Fix: remove @MainActor from the class, use MainActor.run{} only for updating @Observable properties (lastResult, isLoading, lastError). The DNS query/callback/DispatchSource work must stay off the main actor.
close_reason: Fixed in a8a768b — nonisolated on DNS work methods prevents dispatch_assert_queue_fail
